eolInt eolMesh::_curFrame

frame that is currently in the _vertices list

eolFace* eolMesh::_faces

pointer to allocated triangle array

eolGroup* eolMesh::_groups

pointer to allocated bone array

eolUint eolMesh::_normalArray

index of frame buffered normal array. 0 if not used

eolVec3D* eolMesh::_normals

pointer to allocated normal array

eolUint eolMesh::_numFaces

number of faces that make up this mesh

eolUint eolMesh::_numGroups

number of bones associated with this mesh

eolUint eolMesh::_numNormals

number of normals calculated for this mesh

eolUint eolMesh::_numTexels

number of texture coordinates for this mesh

eolUint eolMesh::_numVertices

number of vertices that make up this mesh

eolInt eolMesh::_refCount

internal reference count for this mesh

eolVec3D* eolMesh::_rest

pointer to allocated vertex array at rest position

eolUint eolMesh::_texelArray

index of frame buffered texel array. 0 if not used

eolVert2D* eolMesh::_texels

pointer to allocated texture vertex array

eolBool eolMesh::_usesBuffer

if this mesh is using frame buffered arrays

eolUint eolMesh::_vertexArray

index of frame buffered vertex array. 0 if not used

eolVec3D* eolMesh::_vertices

pointer to allocated vertex array

eolVec3D eolMesh::bounds

width, height and depth of mesh

eolVec3D eolMesh::center

relative position of the mesh's center
